00035         {
00036                 $subnavbar_sections = array_merge($subnavbar_sections, $development);
00037         }
00038         
00039         // Append link to registration page if commercial or shareware software, donation page otherwise
00040         switch ($this->software->license) {
00041                 case "shareware":
00042                 case "commercial":
00043                         $subnavbar_sections = array_merge($subnavbar_sections, $register);
00044                         break;
00045                 default:
00046                         $subnavbar_sections = array_merge($subnavbar_sections, $donate);

00051 <?php
00052         $i = 0;
00053         $app_subnavbar_length = count($subnavbar_sections);
00054         foreach ($subnavbar_sections as $section)
00055         {
00056                 $classname = "subnavitem";
00057                 if (isset($_REQUEST['subview']) && $_REQUEST['subview'] == $section['detail'])
00058                 {
00059                         $classname .= " this-subnavitem";
00060                 }
00061                 if ($i == 0)
00062                 {
00063                         $classname .= " subnavfirst";
00064                 }
00065                 else if ($i == $app_subnavbar_length - 1)
00066                 {
00067                         $classname .= " subnavlast";
00068                 }
00069 ?>
00070                 <li>
00071 <?php
00072         print ($section['detail'] == 'donate') ?
00073                 $this->link_to($section['title'],
00074                         array('href' => $this->software->url_to_detail($section['detail']),
00075                                 'class' => $classname)) :
00076                 $this->link_to_remote($section['title'],
00077                         array('action' => $section['detail'],
00078                                 'target' => 'software-content',
00079                                 'id' => $this->software->id,
00080                                 'class' => $classname,
00081                                 'href' => $this->software->url_to_detail($section['detail']),
00082                                 'onmousedown' => "$('#software-navbar .this-subnavitem').removeClass('this-subnavitem');$(this).addClass('this-subnavitem')"));
00083 ?>
